response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a range of features that cater to your needs and desires, making it an invaluable asset. Considering its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $200 for this remarkable product. I believe this offer reflects its true value and presents a great opportunity for you to benefit from its capabilities. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in excellence.", "product_price": 200}
